page.title: 12THREE BUSINESSES, WYKE
page.content: There is a wide variety of secondary and tertiary industries in the area, and the following are details of just three. Prospect Mailing employs 250 workers mostly female. They occupy 60,000 sq.ft. of a converted textile mill in Wyke. The service they provide is the packing and mailing of goods for other companies. Davidson Trucking employs 10 male workers. They own one acre of land and operate 10 bulk lorries to transport goods to and from any part of the country. Automatic Components employs 23 people and operates from the 15,000 sq.ft. offered by an old mill site in Wyke. The firm is involved in the motor components industry, making gears, shafts and turbo chargers.
